text: My Life with Caroline is a 1941 American comedy movie directed by Lewis Milestone and is the English language version of the 1937 play The Train for Venice by Georges Berr. It stars Ronald Colman, Anna Lee, Charles Winninger, Reginald Gardiner, Gilbert Roland, Hugh O'Connell, Murray Alper and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1941 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone
title: My Life with Caroline
